dialog: There's a man out there named 'Shit', calling for us to stop.
We don't know what kind of person he is.
If we don't stop, he could die of thirst.
Seven, tell them to stop the carriage.
Master, I've been eating beans and suffering diarrhea every day.
If I don't have rice soon, I'll starve to death quick.
FaHung, they can't hear you shouting.
Turn back to pick up that man.
Is there anything happier than saving a life?
Yes. This is a good opportunity to practise more of your English.
Did you understand what he said?
I think it's going to be hard for me to visit So.
The clinic that So opened here is also called Po Chi Lam.
Such a joke of him to make us come this far to visit a Western Po Chi Lam.
Master, we don't need to eat beans anymore!
Master, would you like to eat chicken ass?
You don't have any sense of humour!
After that, don't say I have no sense of humour!
I know how to take care of myself.
The carriage is out of control!
I can't hear you! Watch out!
The beer in this town isn't good to drink.
Sit down and let me see it.
Have a look at it first. Look at it.
Dr So, we rescued them from the Gold Sand river.
They woke for a short while, but lost consciousness again.
You massage his chest for me.
She's my master's fiancÃ©, how can you massage her?
We should learn how to do it.
The great spirit has blessed me with another son!
How can you be so rude to a lady?
This means 'What is your name?' Master, I've been eating beans and suffering diarrhea every day.
If I don't have rice soon, I'll starve to death quick.
We can't even search for someone?
They never treat us Chinese miners like human beings. We're accustomed to it.
This policeman is good to us Chinese.
There was a few times he drove away the foreign bullies for us.
Don't touch her again, or I won't be so civil!
No. I'm afraid in case FeiHung won't find us when he's back.
If you fell ill, Master wouldn't be happy.
Yes. 13th Aunt, please go back inside.
Hey, what are you all looking at?
What's so good about a woman?
I can't do anything, but I can always look.
Seven, help me test if it's sticky enough.
You say it was 'good.' I didn't say anything, I was only nodding.
Both of you help me stick these on the street.
You want to train your leg?
If you're not afraid of the hardship...
Press your legs every day for four hours.
No! I'll take advantage of Master's absence.
Tell them to fight me all at once.
If they beat me, they win.
How can I be in the mood to enjoy this landscape?
Why don't you bring me back to the place you found me?
Maybe I'll remember where I came from.
But you don't know what I'm talking about.
Clothes, it would be great if you could speak; you could tell me who I am.
Was this letter written to others, or did someone write to me?
Could it be that I'm called talkative?
If I find him, I'll understand.
If I find him, I'll know who I am.
What can I do for you?
I want to marry your daughter!
You at least know your home.
I don't know where mine is.
You don't understand what I'm saying.
I think the whole day about where to go back.
As of now, verbal communication isn't necessary.
I pat you; you pat me Okay? .
I try to forget, but it keeps returning.
No, it's not a mental problem.
Seeing objects that make her miss Master?
I've told you before, smoking's bad for your health.
If you're my aunt, how can you be my fiancÃ© too?
How can you just grab something?
And I have to be assessed under the sun?
Now everyone in Po Chi Lam is avoiding her.
When women turn that way, they're even worse.
We haven't seen women for a long time.
How is it when she gets ferocious?
Prepare a carriage for me, I want to going back to Tangshan.
You take her for a walk around the laundry, then tell her she's already in Tangshan.
You really think I have a mental problem?
I know how to get back to Tangshan.
Take a tenday trip to San Francisco by carriage, then onto a ship for half a year, crossing the Pacific Ocean to Hong Kong.
After that, take the threeday train to Guangzhou, then transfer to Foshan.
Anyway... I need to go back!
I'm going back to get it.
I'm not listening to your explanation!
I'm not here to explain anything, I want...
I don't want to hear it!
Do you know someone called Talkative?
Then you must know Wong Fei?
I'm going to ask this woman.
How could Master test us like this?
Do you know Wong Fei then?
Don't think because you're a woman, that you can be reckless.
I want to check your pulse.
I want to show you Wong FeiHung's unique move: 'Shadowless Kick of Foshan'.
You're one of the Ten Tigers of Guangdong.
You live at 8 South City Street, Foshan.
An expert in cut wounds and bone setting.
Promoter of the spirit of Kung Fu, open to challenge, and tough on outlaws.
The second generation of Po Chi Lam, Wong FeiHung!
What are the Ten Tigers of Guangdong?
I live in 8 South City Street, Foshan?
An expert in cut wounds and bone setting?
Promoter of the spirit of Kung Fu, open to challenge, and tough on outlaws?
The second generation of Po Chi Lam, Wong FeiHung?
Can't you see we both have the same posture?
Seven, he doesn't know who he is.
Think quickly how to help him regain his memory!
Wong FeiHung, I, Yan Zhendong, want to challenge you today.
I am Iron Shirt Yan Zhendong.
Wong FeiHung, Iron Cloth is attacked at the stomach, not the face!
Wong FeiHung, do you remember Commander NaIan?
Master, why are you fighting more and more vigorously?
Seven, how badly did you fall?
This trip to America is really like a dream.
You mean a dream with a foreign lover.
I guess the dream was worth it.
You can give a ring twice but not wipe your face again?
But I have no memory of anything you've told me.
I don't understand what you're talking about.
Do you think about that woman?
Didn't you just say you haven't thought of that woman?
Thinking and missing are two different things.
The truth is, I don't want to talk to you.
You know how reserved I am.
It's something I'd never directly say.
Uncle Long, Master Wong is here!
Master Wong is here, so what?
Master Wong doesn't like people gambling.
We can pack up early and gamble again later.
No way! How can you do that?
I bet on one, and one is up!
Hey, did you win the money?
I'll play too! Let's play together!
Come on, let me be the dealer, okay?
Let's bet. Master Wong asks us to.
Anyway, everyone has so much money and nowhere to use it.
Why don't you bet it all?
Master Wong, you are our hope.
If you do this too, we'll have no more inspiration.
I'm not used to this. Master Wong, can you return to your former self?
I actually came here today to thank you all for your caring.
I have a few words I want to say.
Everyone has come along way through the seas to this unusual place.
The opening of Po Chi Lam is for...
...everyone needs to know how to get along with others, and especially to understand who you are.
I don't wish for Po Chi Lam to become prosperous...
...I hope Po Chi Lam can carry out the consistent spirit...
Simply put, everyone remember who they are.
I'll say this much for today.
Master Wong, what you said just now was indeed brilliant!
Master Wong, no more speeches please.
Hey, Uncle Han, what does this man do?
He's our foreman; always takes a share of our pay.
You can kick fast, so what?
Don't forget that this is a world of guns.
Can your kicking be faster than bullets?
How is everyone? How are you?
Everyone, I have something to say today.
Master Wong, you have something to say again?
There's no need! It's better showing us a demonstration of Cross Fist.
Today, it is the first anniversary of the American Po Chi Lam.
Firstly, I'd like to thank you all for taking care of my student, So.
Don't mention it, we're all Chinese.
We should help each other, right?
Everyone, you've come a long way through the seas to an unusual place.
You should watch out for and help each other.
Po Chi Lam was established in the hope that this could be achieved.
But I don't wish for the business to be prosperous.
If the case, it would mean everyone is suffering.
That is not what I want.
I hope that the American Po Chi Lam will become the back garden for everyone living overseas.
When there is time, people can sit, have tea, chat, practise Kung Fu, refresh, maintain physical health.
I really hope to maintain the consistent spirit of Po Chi Lam.
We'll strive together, learn the positives of the foreigners and take that home, and shine for the Chinese race!
Please come in everyone for snacks!
Master, should there not have been some applause?
Perhaps it was 13th Aunt coming out...
They're saying we were involved in a bank robbery.
They want to search here now.
He said he would get the best conditions for us...
...so long as we hand over seven people to plead guilty, the rest will be okay.
This is indeed a matter for Po Chi Lam.
Nothing to do with anyone else.
So, ask the sheriff, can I take responsibility alone?
Master, don't say you'll take responsibility alone!
Even if you are first, I'll be second to confess!
I'll not be the third, I'll be seventh!
This is clearly a miscarriage of justice.
Master Wong, you are young and promising; the leader of our generation.
Your life should be spared for the good of Chinese workers.
You have nothing to do with Po Chi Lam.
Uncle, our story shouldn't be the struggles of overseas Chinese but the glory of Chinese workers.
I, Wong FeiHung, must stand out!
I couldn't have imagined that coming to America a year ago to establish the branch of Po Chi Lam would actually pave the way for this catastrophe.
Also that I involved my master.
Getting married, having a newborn child, worked hard to earn money, acted like an emperor at home, yet struggled outside.
Master Wong, this is all I can do.
Master, it's all over to you.
Master, I have full confidence in you.
Why is it that, when we were arrested, you weren't there?
Master, he was the one who robbed the bank.
I have to catch him, to prove my innocence.
Master, let me have these two!
I need you to prove my innocence.
I asked them here to save you.
Seven, prepare to collect the greens.
I'm sure you'll be a good mayor.
It's time to get on the carriage.
Yes. If you don't get the carriage, you won't get the boat,  so you'd better go.
Master, did you not intend to make along speech?
I've heard that she's Uncle Long's 'wife'.
Right! It is a nice place!
I'm very tired. I'll need at least three days' rest before I can serve you.
No problem! Three days is fine!
Then why are they so happy?
Happy No more than ten people a day, and also, a vegetarian diet on the 1st and 15th.
You really can't remember the Indian woman?
So, there's no need to see us off!
We'll come and visit you next year!
